member.name: HMAC_INFO
member.summary: The HMAC_INFO structure specifies the hash algorithm and the inner and outer strings that are to be used to calculate the HMAC hash.

member.name: HMAC_INFO.HashAlgid
member.summary: Specifies the hash algorithm to be used.

member.name: HMAC_INFO.pbInnerString
member.summary: A pointer to the inner string to be used in the HMAC calculation. The default inner string is defined as the byte 0x36 repeated 64 times.

member.name: HMAC_INFO.cbInnerString
member.summary: The count of bytes in pbInnerString. The CSP uses the default inner string if cbInnerString is equal to zero.

member.name: HMAC_INFO.pbOuterString
member.summary: A pointer to the outer string to be used in the HMAC calculation. The default outer string is defined as the byte 0x5C repeated 64 times.

member.name: HMAC_INFO.cbOuterString
member.summary: The count of bytes in pbOuterString. The CSP uses the default outer string if cbOuterString is equal to zero.
